description: Ram Sharan Mahat is a Nepali politician, technocrat, and a senior leader of the Nepali Congress party. Born in rural Nuwakot, he was politically active from his student days. He holds a Ph.D. in Economics and worked for the UNDP in various roles before entering electoral politics in 1990. Mahat has served as Nepal's Finance Minister on several occasions, including in the government led by Sushil Koirala, and was named 'Best Finance Minister' in 2016 by The Banker magazine. He also served as Minister of Foreign Affairs and was a member of parliament for four consecutive terms.
short_description: Nepali politician and a senior leader of the Nepali Congress party who has served multiple times as the Finance Minister of Nepal.
